Chamaleon/Perceptor/Blacknightmare/Deepfear/Charon/Undergroun/Sharpclaws:

=
"Chamaleon, come in" said a voice that came from Perceptor's Office. The ma=
le came in, Perceptor felt that Blacknightmarewas araound and said that she=
 and Blaze could came in. Chamaleon's scales became gray when he saw Bullet=
 and Perceptor had to command him to sat down, the lizard-bot was shaking l=
ike a leaf...

"Well Bullet here's your punishment" said Perceptor "Our com=
mander is very upset that most of our bots kick, stabbe, etc. Chamelon, so =
your punishment will be this: you will have two days of retention in base..=
. plus in order to compensate Chameleon, 
you will care that NO ONE HURT HI=
M... for every scratch that Chameleon has, YOU will be punished, if you do =
it or not... anyone have something to say?"
